EqualyApplication - Class in org.hwr.equaly
 
EqualyApplication() - Constructor for class org.hwr.equaly.EqualyApplication
 
EqualyController - Class in org.hwr.equaly.controller
Controller containing the logic used to interact with user through web frontend.
EqualyController(DBHandler, LanguageTagger, Tokenizer, POSTagger) - Constructor for class org.hwr.equaly.controller.EqualyController
DBHandler instance is autowired in like this for performance reasons (only once at first startup), initializing the database connection, then making the DBHandler accessible to all methods.
exchangeArticles(DBHandler, Language, AnalysisContainer) - Method in interface org.hwr.equaly.controller.exchanger.WordExchanger
Takes in an AnalysisContainer carrying a set of Fragments that already may have undergone the substantive exchange process Uses gathered informations from that previous exchange process to derive necessities for article replacements, carries them out and notes them aswell in the then returned, modified AnalysisContainer.
exchangeArticles(DBHandler, Language, AnalysisContainer) - Method in class org.hwr.equaly.controller.exchanger.WordExchangerImpl
Takes in an AnalysisContainer carrying a set of Fragments that already may have undergone the substantive exchange process Uses gathered informations from that previous exchange process to derive necessities for article replacements, carries them out and notes them aswell in the then returned, modified AnalysisContainer.
exchangeSubstantives(DBHandler, Language, Fragment[][]) - Method in interface org.hwr.equaly.controller.exchanger.WordExchanger
Takes in Fragments split up into sentences (x) and their word tokens (y), processes the fragment values and substitutes fragments identified as substitutable substantives, notes which words where replaced where in the fragment set.
exchangeSubstantives(DBHandler, Language, Fragment[][]) - Method in class org.hwr.equaly.controller.exchanger.WordExchangerImpl
Takes in Fragments split up into sentences (x) and their word tokens (y), processes the fragment values and substitutes fragments identified as substitutable substantives, notes which words where replaced where in the fragment set.
